name: market for cooling energy | cooling energy | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8386/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'cooling energy', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;cooling energy' describes a single stage absorption chiller operated with heat from a natural gas, 1.67 MJ heat from natural gas are turned into 1 MJ of cooling energy. It includes heat and water loss. The module also includes heat input from a 160kWel cogeneration unit, electricity and water needed for operation and infrastructure. The supply temperature of the chilled water is 6Â°C. 

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'cooling energy',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  cooling energy', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
